participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and nostalgic, loves to connect with others through music and dance.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i was born in the early 80s. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and family-oriented, enjoys outdoor activities and sports.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live in a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
